text:
Our philosophy at
American Airlines from a
customer experience perspective is to
give our customers the tools
that they need and enable our team members
to help the customers along that way.

At American, we previously
had a lot of complexity
with our contact center technology.

So by looking for
a platform like AWS and

and the Amazon Connect platform,
we were able to provide

that more consistent experience
for our team members.

With the Amazon Connect
platform, we've been able

to successfully onboard more
than 40 contact centers in just
under 18 months, which is a huge deal.

And we're now live with over
10,000 team members across 28
different geographic locations.

So when you think about a
company like American Airlines at

that type of scale, we've been
really happy with being able
to go so quickly on migration like that.

In our old platform, we were
at times having to do work

for weeks and spend tens of
thousands of dollars in order

to make just simple
adjustments to that tool.
But with Amazon Connect, we're able
to make those adjustments in days.

With the improvement in
containment rates that we've seen,
customers are able to self-serve

and get the information
they need without ever
having to speak to a team member.
And when they do speak to a team member,

the modern interface that
they're using is enabling them
to help the customer in a more efficient

and expedited manner, which is
a win for both the customers
and our team members.
